tha-ap81:0.3_0: Held together and senior monks, who were standing.
tha-ap81:1.1_0: I used to be in a sorry state.
tha-ap81:1.4_0: he is the mark of a Build;
tha-ap81:2.2_0: and he left behind his back.
tha-ap81:2.3_0: he was seated close by a great man
tha-ap81:4.2_0: I raised my joined palms to him.
tha-ap81:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap81:4.4_0: This is the fruit of a creepers.
tha-ap81:5.2_0: let us get rid of herds!
tha-ap81:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap81:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vañjā.
tha-ap81:8.1_0: The ninth part of the senior monks are standing.
